alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 18 at 2:59AM PST until February 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 21 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area, and Cascade mountains of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass, and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will be Saturday evening and Saturday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
